mapper.select: select COUNT(*) from HEART where CAMP_IDX=#{camp_idx}
select * from HEART where CAMP_IDX=#{camp_idx} and EMAIL=#{email}
mapper.delete: delete from HEART where EMAIL=#{email} and CAMP_IDX=#{camp_idx}
mapper.select: select count(*) from HEART H inner join CAMP C on H.camp_idx=C.camp_idx inner join IMG I on H.camp_idx=I.camp_idx where H.EMAIL=#{email} and I.division='thumb' order by C.camp_name desc
